languages.text: {n}Вокс начинает опасно вибрировать, словно вот-вот перейдет в истерический вопль.{/n} "Затем единица была изменена. Священные аугментации подвергались перестройке, полной замене, модификации. Затем единице была оказана первичная медицинская помощь. Затем единица... единица... единица..."

{n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс начинает опасно вибрировать, словно вот-вот перейдет в истерический вопль.{/n} "Затем единица была изменена. Священные аугментации подвергались перестройке, полной замене, модификации. Затем единице была оказана первичная медицинская помощь. Затем единица... единица... единица..."

Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}彼のヴォクスは不気味に振動し始め、今にもヒステリックな叫び声が爆発しそうだ。{/n}「その後、このユニットに手が加えられました。神聖な増強装置が改造の対象となったのです。交換や修理が施されました。そして、この部隊は基本的な医療支援を受けた。そしてこのユニットは…ユニット…ユニット…」
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼のヴォクスは不気味に振動し始め、今にもヒステリックな叫び声が爆発しそうだ。{/n}「その後、このユニットに手が加えられました。神聖な増強装置が改造の対象となったのです。交換や修理が施されました。そして、この部隊は基本的な医療支援を受けた。そしてこのユニットは…ユニット…ユニット…」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}他的声音开始不祥地震颤起来，仿佛随时都会爆发出歇斯底里的尖叫。{/n}“之后，本单位遭到了篡改。神圣的植入物遭到了重组，进行了替换、修改。在那之后，本单位得到了基本的医疗援助。随后，本单位……单位……单位……”
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的声音开始不祥地震颤起来，仿佛随时都会爆发出歇斯底里的尖叫。{/n}“之后，本单位遭到了篡改。神圣的植入物遭到了重组，进行了替换、修改。在那之后，本单位得到了基本的医疗援助。随后，本单位……单位……单位……”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Su voco comienza a vibrar ominosamente, como si estuviera a punto de estallar en un grito histérico.{/n} «Entonces esta unidad fue alterada. Sus aumentos sagrados fueron sometidos a reestructuración. Sustitución completa. Modificación. Entonces esta unidad recibió asistencia médica básica. Entonces esta unidad... unidad... unidad...».
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su voco comienza a vibrar ominosamente, como si estuviera a punto de estallar en un grito histérico.{/n} «Entonces esta unidad fue alterada. Sus aumentos sagrados fueron sometidos a reestructuración. Sustitución completa. Modificación. Entonces esta unidad recibió asistencia médica básica. Entonces esta unidad... unidad... unidad...».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sein Vox beginnt, bedrohlich zu vibrieren, als würde er gleich in hysterisches Geschrei ausbrechen.{/n} "Dann wurde diese Einheit verändert. Ihre heiligen Augmentationen wurden einer Restrukturierung unterzogen. Vollständiger Austausch. Modifikation. Dann hat diese Einheit grundlegende medizinische Unterstützung erhalten. Dann hat diese Einheit ... Einheit ... Einheit ..."
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sein Vox beginnt, bedrohlich zu vibrieren, als würde er gleich hysterisch zu schreien beginnen.{/n} "Dann wurde diese Einheit verändert. Ihre heiligen Augmentationen wurden einer Restrukturierung unterzogen. Vollständiger Austausch. Modifikation. Dann hat diese Einheit grundlegende medizinische Unterstützung erhalten. Dann hat diese Einheit ... Einheit ... Einheit ..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Son vox se met à vibrer comme s'il était à deux doigts de l'hystérie.{/n} « Puis cette unité a été modifiée. Ses augmentations sacrées ont été soumises à une restructuration. À un remplacement intégral. À des modifications. Puis cette unité a reçu une assistance médicale rudimentaire. Puis cette unité... unité... unité... »
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son vox se met à vibrer comme s'il était à deux doigts de l'hystérie.{/n} « Puis cette unité a été changée. Ses augmentations sacrées ont été soumises à une restructuration. À un remplacement intégral. À des modifications. Puis cette unité a reçu une assistance médicale rudimentaire. Puis cette unité... unité... unité... »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, kendinden geçip çığlık atmaya başlayacakmışçasına titriyor.{/n} "Ardından bu birim değişime uğradı. Kutsal ogmentasyonlarında yeniden yapılandırmalara, bambaşkalarıyla değiştirilmelere ve modifikasyonlara maruz kaldı. Ardından bu birime temel tıbbi destek verildi. Ardından bu birim... Bu birim... Birim..."
languages.original_text: {n}His vox begins to vibrate ominously as if he is about to burst into a hysterical scream.{/n} "Then this unit was changed. Its sacred augmentations were subjected to restructuring. Complete replacement. Modification. Then this unit received basic medical assistance. Then this unit... unit... unit..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın voksu, kendinden geçip çığlık atmaya başlayacakmışçasına endişelendirici bir şekilde titremeye başlıyor.{/n} "Ardından bu birim değişime uğradı. Kutsal ogmentasyonlarında yeniden yapılandırmalara, bambaşkalarıyla değiştirilmelere ve modifikasyonlara maruz kaldı. Ardından bu birime temel tıbbi destek verildi. Ardından bu birim... Bu birim... Birim..."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
